Ramsbottom is a pretty historic village with a lot to show. One of the reasons that Ramsbottom is such a nice place is its position amidst the West Pennine Moors. It is the most northerly part of the Bury Borough and is split up into areas including Holcolmbe and Summerseat. It is part of the Bury North constituency.
